explains: adj. 震耳欲聋的；极喧闹的
v. 使……聋（deafen 的 ing 形式）

sentences.en: The noise of the machine was deafening.
sentences.cn: 机器的轰鸣声震耳欲聋。

sentences.en: Four deafening explosions shattered the stillness of the night air.
sentences.cn: 4声震耳欲聋的爆炸打破了夜空的宁静。

sentences.en: One blinding flash after another came, and peal on peal of deafening thunder.
sentences.cn: 炫目的闪电一道接着一道，震耳欲聋的雷声一声接着一声。
